template.name: z i designer
z 정상 뉴
template.value: -- ====================================== -- ======== ======= -- ====================================== SELECT o.idx order_idx, c.commodity_idx, od.NAME receiver, order_date, o.status order_status, c.code1, c.code2, c.code3, c.memo3 commodity_name, c.quantity, c.dprice, c.make_site, c.make_step commodity_status, co.co_seq commodity_option_idx, co.co_poi_name poi_name, co.co_pov_name pov_name, co.co_value1 pov_value1, co.co_value2 pov_value2, P.packing_date FROM (SELECT C.ORDER_IDX, C.IDX AS COMM_IDX FROM ORDER_STEP_TIME T, COMMODITY C WHERE T.ORDER_IDX = C.ORDER_IDX AND ORDER_STEP_ID IN (3, 95) AND TO_CHAR(STEP_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') BETWEEN '2019/07/01' and '2019/07/31' AND 0 = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMODITY CMDT WHERE CMDT.ORDER_IDX = T.ORDER_IDX AND CMDT.MAKE_SITE NOT IN ('JMM.PRINT')) UNION SELECT ORDER_IDX, COMM_IDX FROM COMMODITY_MAKE_STEP_HISTORY WHERE TO_CHAR(MAKE_STEP_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') BETWEEN '2019/07/01' and '2019/07/31' AND MAKE_STEP_CODE IN (20300, 90100) AND 0 < (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMODITY CMDT WHERE CMDT.ORDER_IDX = COMMODITY_MAKE_STEP_HISTORY.ORDER_IDX AND CMDT.MAKE_SITE NOT IN ('JMM.PRINT'))) STEP JOIN (SELECT IDX, STATUS, TO_CHAR(oder_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order_date FROM TBLORDER WHERE INSITE IN ('BIZHOWS', 'BIZHOWS.M')) o ON STEP.order_idx = O.idx JOIN (SELECT IDX AS COMMODITY_IDX, CODE1, CODE2, CODE3, MEMO3, QUANTITY, DPRICE, MAKE_SITE, MAKE_STEP, STATUS FROM COMMODITY WHERE make_site = 'JMM.PRINT') C ON C.COMMODITY_IDX = STEP.COMM_IDX JOIN (SELECT ORDER_IDX, NAME FROM order_delivery) od ON od.order_idx = o.idx JOIN commodity_option co ON co.co_cmdt_idx = c.COMMODITY_IDX JOIN (SELECT COMM_IDX, TO_CHAR(MAX(MAKE_STEP_DATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') packing_date FROM COMMODITY_MAKE_STEP_HISTORY WHERE MAKE_STEP_CODE IN (20300, 90100) group by COMM_IDX) P ON P.COMM_IDX = STEP.COMM_IDX -- [3, 95, 2019/07/01, 2019/08/31, JMM.PRINT, 2019/07/01, 2019/08/31, 20300, 90100, JMM.PRINT, BIZHOWS, BIZHOWS.M, JMM.PRINT, 20300, 90100] -- ====================================== -- ====================================== -- ======================================

template.name: z get userinfo by 송장이 하나이상인 상품
template.value: select cnt, id, PASSWORD, ORDER_NO, ORDER_IDX from (select COMM_IDX, count(COMM_IDX) cnt from DELIVERY_INVOICE group by COMM_IDX having count(COMM_IDX) > 1) inner join COMMODITY on (COMMODITY.idx = COMM_IDX) inner join TBLORDER on (TBLORDER.IDX = COMMODITY.ORDER_IDX) inner join TBLUSER on (PASSWORD is not null and COMMODITY.OWNER = TBLUSER.ID) order by ORDER_IDX desc$END$ ;

template.name: z get userinfo by 주문상태
template.value: /* null 오브젝트 | INVALID_STATUS(-1, "No such order status."), 주문중 | STATUS_ORDERING(0, "주문중"), 묶음 배송 | STATUS_BUNDLE_ORDERING(22, "묶음배송"), 결제 모둘 호출 | STATUS_CALL_PG(6, "결제 모둘 호출"), 주문 완료. 미 결제 | STATUS_ORDERED_NOT_PAY(1, "주문 완료. 미 결제"), 주문 완료. 결제 확인 | STATUS_ORDERED(2, "주문 완료. 결제 확인"), 자동검토 완료 | STATUS_AUTO_VALIDATED(31, "자동검토 완료"), 고객응대 완료 | STATUS_CUSTOMER_RECEPTION(12, "고객응대 완료"), 다운로드 준비완료 | STATUS_READY_DOWNLOAD(9, "다운로드 준비완료"), 인화 준비 완료 | STATUS_READY_PRINT(7, "인화 준비 완료"), 인화 완료 | STATUS_PRINTED(11, "인화 완료"), 포장 완료 | STATUS_PACKED(3, "포장 완료"), 배송 출하 | STATUS_DELIVERY(4, "배송 출하"), 배송 완료 | STATUS_END(5, "배송 완료"), 주문 보류 | STATUS_ORDER_POSTPONE(99, "주문 보류"), 주문 취소 | STATUS_ORDER_CANCEL(98, "주문 취소"), 불량 주문 | STATUS_WRONG_ORDER(95, "불량 주문"), 주문 취소-정리완료 | STATUS_ORDER_CANCEL_COMPLETE(96, "주문 취소-정리완료"), 주문 정리완료 | STATUS_ORDER_COMPLETE(97, "주문 정리완료"); */ select oder_date, ORDER_NO, IDX, id, PASSWORD from (select ROWNUM rnum, TBLORDER.*, TBLUSER.* from TBLORDER inner join TBLUSER on (PASSWORD is not null and TBLORDER.OWNER = TBLUSER.ID) where STATUS = 99 order by idx desc ) where rnum < 10;$END$

template.name: z get userinfo by 상품, 코드3 상태
template.value: select CART_DATE, idx, MEMO3, id, PASSWORD from (select ROWNUM rnum, COMMODITY.*, TBLUSER.* from COMMODITY inner join TBLUSER on (PASSWORD is not null and COMMODITY.OWNER = TBLUSER.ID) where CODE2 = 200 and CODE3 = 11005 and STATUS = 1)$END$ where rnum < 10;
